title: Paper Sheet With Wool Samples, ca. 1750
medium:
Medium: paper and wool
Technique: felted plain weave
description: Sheet of paper pasted with double row of samples of fulled wool in bright colors, dark greens and purples, and white from Carcassonne, France. Intended for export to the Levant.

tombstone.epitaph:
Paper Sheet With Wool Samples, ca. 1750.
ca. 1750. Medium: paper and wool
Technique: felted plain weave. Gift of Alice B. Beer. 1951-158-1.
